00017 GaussianCF::GaussianCF(double lengthScale, double variance)

00037 double GaussianCF::correlation(double sqDist) const
00038 {
00039     return exp(-0.5 * sqDist / sqr(lengthScale) );
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00051 double GaussianCF::correlationGradient(int p, double sqDist) const
00052 {
00053     assert(p>=0 && p<numberParameters);
00054 
00055     switch (p) {
00056     // Gradient with respect to length scale
00057     case 0:
00058         return sqDist * correlation(sqDist) / pow(lengthScale,3.0);
00059 
00060     // Gradient with respect to process variance
00061     case 1:
00062         return 0.0;
00063     }
00064 }
